EmailTemplate.name: September Emails 2018.AppDynamics - CN Insights Email - 9-4-18
EmailTemplate.subject: 9/13 Webinar - Cloud-Native Insights: How Platform & App Visibility Drive Business Outcomes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us for the webinar Cloud-Native Insights: How Platform & App Visibility Drive Business Outcomes <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/sep-13-cloud-native-insights-how-platform-app-visibility-can-drive-business-outcome-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=cn-app-visibility-appdynamics&utm_term=q318]]>, on September 13, 2018.
As companies continue to migrate their applications to the cloud, they need increased levels of infrastructure and application visibility. In this webinar, you’ll learn how to:
- Enable your DevOps teams with seamless and instant application and business performance monitoring of apps deployed in Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF)
- Detect any emerging issue before it becomes a business problem
- Ensure every code release drives business outcomes
Presenters: Mark Prichard, Senior Director of Product Management, AppDynamics Jonah Kowal, VP Market Development & Insights, AppDynamics Kamala Dasika, GTM for Pivotal Cloud Foundry Technology Partners, Pivotal
Date: Thursday, September 13, 2018 Time: 10:00am PDT / 1:00pm EDT
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/sep-13-cloud-native-insights-how-platform-app-visibility-can-drive-business-outcome-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=cn-app-visibility-appdynamics&utm_term=q318]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c000200I0NAU0rCJC001O00]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://info.pivotal.io/TDAIO000r0000U220N00CJ0]]>.
